column5: This summer while up at Rama i bought a hat that jumped out at me and had to have it , it read Native Pride on it , cost me 30 bucks and a few weeks later it blew off going across Simcoe and sank before i could get it , just now on Chut'em Chut'em one of them is wearing the same hat . Was it mine ?????? .... lol .
I hear ya , ever notice how the only hat's that float are the one's with fishing related stuff on them . Tighter knit .
LOVE "Native Pride" as it's where I get my least expensive gasoline and good CIGARS for a reasonable price....  http://www.newyorkstategasprices.com/Native_Pride_Gas_Stations/Irving/56600/index.aspx
My Merc hat blew off years back---caught an undertow in the river---spun to bottom--never seen again  u know how hard those are to get?
Its always the good one's is'nt , my other hat thats on here for one of my pictures , my wife bought at flee market for a few bucks and its been in the water more times this summer .
A "flea market hat"......might be a good thing that it's been in the water many times....
